TopicTitle: Problem with KAS(kerbal attachment system) sounds.

Articles.Content: I have the game on steam,so I got the mod from spaceport and installed it.It works just fine,but it doesnt have any textures on the pipes,struts and generally anything u link/attach to another part.Also theres no sound,and every time i load a ship with a part from KAS it says that i havent installed KAS correctly and sounds arent installed correctly.But how am i suppose to install them correctly?Please help me guys.
Just to be sure, redownload from forum (4.4.*) drop the gamedata folder from the archive in the folder were you have ksp.exe. merge the content of the folders.
